'''Meticulous Craftsmanship''' is a part of the [[Graven Innocence]] event in [[Version 3.0]].

==Summary==
Complete the storyline quest "Meticulous Craftsmanship" to get [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mora]], and other rewards.
